Configuration.Name: L1=8m_L2=1p3m_central
Configuration.SetupScript:
config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 #config.wavelength_spread = 0.064 config.det = 510 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g5' config.apx = -72 config.bs = 3 config.beamcenterx = 91.57 config.beamcenterz = 96.14
config.drive()
